title: Orchestral Fantasy Music Pack
description: Orchestral Fantasy RPG Music - 20 loopable tracks, 27 minutes of music, PERFECT for your fantasy adventure RPG!
longDescription:
🎧 LISTEN TO THE FULL MUSIC PACK.


All tracks are YouTube and Streaming safe! No need to worry about copyright strikes :)


This music pack contains 20 loopable tracks, totalling 27 minutes of high-quality ORCHESTRAL MUSIC. If you need music for a video game with a fantasy setting, then this is the music pack you're looking for!


Featuring all of the traditional orchestral instruments (woodwinds, brass, percussion, strings), "ORCHESTRAL FANTASY RPG MUSIC" has extra flavours of fantasy music throughout each track - choir, dulcimer, pan flutes, and more! This music pack is sure to have the perfect orchestral fantasy sound to bring your video game to the next level.


*** This music pack will be continually updated with new tracks! Sign up to my mailing list to be notified of all updates. ***

  • Facing the Dragon (LOOP) [1:00]
  • Marching Onwards (LOOP) [1:30]
  • The Enemy Approaches (LOOP) [2:00]
  • Battle (LOOP) [1:30]
  • In the Dark (LOOP) [1:00]
  • Village of Hope (LOOP) [1:30]
  • Magic Among Us (LOOP) [1:30]
  • Forest Creatures (LOOP) [1:00]
  • Adventures Await (LOOP) [1:00]
  • Journey (LOOP) [1:00]
  • Searching the Temple (LOOP) [1:30]
  • Wind in the Sails (LOOP) [1:30]
  • Forest Chase (LOOP) [1:30]
  • Wandering the Village (LOOP) [1:00]
  • The Wizard's Shop (LOOP) [1:30]
  • Royal Courtyard (LOOP) [2:30]
  • Forest Antics (LOOP) [1:00]
  • Warm Embrace (LOOP) [1:00]
  • Lacrima (LOOP) [1:30]
  • Journey's End (LOOP) [1:00]
technicalDetails:
Features:

  • 20 loopable original high-quality WAV tracks (44.1 kHz / 16-bit)
  • 27 minutes of music
  • YouTube-Safe music tracks
  • Unlimited Royalty-Free License

Number of Audio Wavs: 20

Number of Audio Cues: 20

Sample rate / bit rate: 44.1 kHz / 16-bit

Does music loop: Yes

Minutes of audio provided: 27

Supported Engine Versions: 4.0.2 and later

Supported Development Platforms: Android, Gear VR, HoloLens 2, HTML5, iOS, Linux, MacOS, Nintendo Switch, Oculus, PlayStation 4, Steam VR, Windows 32-bit, Windows 64-bit, Xbox One
